title: EducationAttendanceType
description: Contains details documenting a person's attendance at an educational institution. (OED Institution, n. An establishment, organization, or association, instituted for the promotion of education.)

EducationDegreeType.title: EducationDegreeType
EducationDegreeType.description: Contains details about the student's degree. A degree is a recognized completion of studies at a school (such as a college or university). A certificate, which may be a diploma or degree, is generally issued in recognition of having completed the course of study.

specializations.description: The focus of study for the student's degree. This may include majors, minors, emphasis or other foci.

iscedEducationLevelCode.description: ISCED: International Standard Classification of Education - is the standard classification of the education level of this attendance.

institution.description: The institution to which the person attended.

department.description: The department at the institution to which the person attended.

programs.description: The list of programs to which the person attended.

educationLevelCodes.description: The identifier to the level of the education attendance. This could be country-specific or industry-specific classifications.

currentlyAttendingIndicator.description: Indicator that the person is still attending.

goodStandingIndicator.description: Indicator that the person is currently in good standing according to the rules of the educational institution.

educationDegrees.description: The degrees which were awarded or in process at the institution.

start.description: The start date of the additional attendance period if known.

end.description: The end date of the additional attendance period if known.
